target, distributing harm between both of you. When you first @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}, the target recovers [[/r 1d4]] Hit Points. The first time each round that the target takes damage, reduce the damage it takes by 3 (to a minimum of 0 damage). You lose 3 Hit Points each time, or the total damage dealt, if less than 3; this damage ignores any immunities or resistances you have and canâ€™t otherwise be mitigated in any way.

The spell ends immediately if you fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target 2 creatures other than
you. Increase the initial healing to [[/r 3d4]] and the maximum
